description: Adobe Photoshop is an essential tool for users at all levels of skill or experience, who work with digital images. Photoshop CS6 offers a large list of tools for altering, adjusting, re-imagining photos, and manipulating; the challenging aspect of using Photoshop is figuring out where to begin. This video is precisely what you need if you’re new to Photoshop. Filled with short, engaging lessons that show the program’s key features and tools in action, and illustrate the steps to go through with your photos, from organizing and making basic adjustments to your files in Adobe Bridge, to creating simple and attractive projects that highlight your images. In this video  you will learn Photoshop fundamentals such as layers, retouching tools, filters, and type, with clear demonstrations and tips on how to use each feature.
title: Photoshop CS6: Video QuickStart
